name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Boil the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
In a pan, sauté the onion and garlic.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in the tomatoes and simmer for 20 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve the sauce over the spaghetti.

name: Chicken Curry
description: A flavorful chicken curry with a spicy kick.
instructions: Sauté the onion until soft.
Add the chicken and cook until lightly browned.
Stir in the curry powder and cook for 1 minute.
Add the coconut milk and simmer for 15 minutes.
Add the bell pepper and simmer for 5 more minutes.
Season with salt and serve with rice.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A simple and classic pizza topped with tomato, mozzarella, and basil.
ingredients: A handful of fresh basil leaves
Salt and olive oil to taste
instructions: Preheat the oven to 220°C (430°F).
Spread the tomato sauce evenly over the pizza dough.
Top with sliced mozzarella.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with a pinch of salt.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until crust is golden.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves and serve.

name: Beef Stir-Fry
description: Quick and delicious beef stir-fry with vegetables.
instructions: Combine soy sauce, oyster sauce, and cornstarch in a bowl.
Heat oil in a wok or skillet over high heat.
Add beef and stir-fry until browned.
Add peppers and onion and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Pour in the sauce mixture and stir until thickened.
Season with salt and pepper, serve hot.

name: Caesar Salad
description: A crisp and refreshing salad with a creamy Caesar dressing.
instructions: Place the chopped lettuce in a large bowl.
Add croutons and Parmesan cheese.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing.
Toss gently to combine.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately.

name: Pan-Seared Salmon
description: Moist and tender salmon fillet with a crisp exterior.
instructions: Season salmon fillets with salt and pepper.
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium-high heat.
Place salmon fillets skin-side down and cook for 3-4 minutes.
Flip the fillets, add butter and garlic to the pan.
Cook an additional 2-3 minutes, until just cooked through.
Squeeze lemon juice over the top and serve.

name: Vegetable Lasagna
description: A hearty vegetarian lasagna packed with fresh vegetables and creamy cheese.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and herbs to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cook lasagna noodles according to package directions.
Layer noodles, tomato sauce, spinach, zucchini, squash, and ricotta in a baking dish.
Repeat layers and top with shredded mozzarella.
Bake for 35-40 minutes until bubbly.
Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing.

name: Greek Salad
description: A vibrant salad with fresh veggies, feta cheese, and olives.
instructions: Combine tomatoes, cucumber, bell pepper, and red onion in a bowl.
Add feta cheese and olives.
Drizzle with olive oil and red wine vinegar.
Sprinkle with oregano and a pinch of salt.
Toss gently and serve.

name: Pad Thai
description: A popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish with a balance of sweet, sour, and savory flavors.
ingredients: Chopped peanuts and lime wedges for garnish
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water until softened, then drain.
Heat oil in a wok, add shrimp and cook until pink.
Push shrimp aside, crack egg and scramble.
Add noodles, fish sauce, tamarind paste, and brown sugar; stir to combine.
Add bean sprouts and stir-fry for another minute.
Garnish with chopped peanuts and serve with lime wedges.

name: Chocolate Brownies
description: Rich and fudgy chocolate brownies with a crackly top.
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Melt chocolate and butter together.
Stir in sugar and vanilla extract.
Beat in eggs one at a time.
Fold in flour and salt.
Pour into a baking pan and bake for 20-25 minutes.
Allow to cool before slicing.
